channel.title: Data Cleaning on Data Curious
channel.description: Recent content in Data Cleaning on Data Curious

item.title: Amusement Park Injuries in TX, USA
item.description: Amusement park injuries data is from data.world. This is part of the weekly #TidyTuesday project aimed at the R ecosystem on Twitter. The data has a lot of text, inconsistent NAs and dates. Objectives Clean the data Perform EDA and Data viz To achieve the objectives we shall answer the following questions How many injuries were recorded per year, per month? What kind of injuries were reported? What were the top causes of injuries?
